author: xclusiveyachtsdubai@gmail.com
title: Watersports, Water Sports Dubai, Donut Ride, Dubai, Banana Boat Ride Dubai
text: 48ft favicon Ride our giant inflatable banana craft pulled by a powerful speedy boat, Thrill as you crash through the breakers into the warm blue waters, hold on tight as you bounce over the chop and wave. Experience thrill and exhilaration together. Banana ride: If your idea of water-sport is something a little more sedate than hop-in on a round donut. Pulled by a boat and go for a spin of a lifetime. A popular fun ride not to be missed. Donut Ride: Compliment your charter with thrill seeking water excitement, each ride last approximately 15mins. An adrenaline rushing experience is what you relate with water sports in Dubai. Xclusive Yachts can do it for you. Along with the gracious stay of yours on the beautiful yachts, you can also indulge in some adventure. The donut ride and the banana boat ride are the most popular rides that people explore in Dubai along with parasailing. Not only does Xclusive Yachts offer such watersports but it also ensures that the safety of all its guests is being given the top priority. Accordingly, helmet and life jackets are mandatory for all the guests. Activity
